label: Earth Exploration-Satellite (Passive)
description: Used for satellite-based measurement of water vapour and atmospheric sounding.

label: Fixed, Mobile, and Inter-Satellite
description: Communication between fixed points and satellites, also used for mobile services.

label: Mobile and Inter-Satellite
description: Used for mobile communications and space-based satellite services.

label: Earth Exploration-Satellite (Passive)
description: Satellite sensing of atmospheric conditions, including water vapour.

label: Radio Astronomy
description: Used for radio astronomy observations, including continuum and spectral line observations.

label: Earth Exploration-Satellite (Passive)
description: Used for passive satellite sensing of atmospheric conditions.

label: Mobile and Fixed Satellite
description: Used for fixed and mobile satellite communication, deep space research.

label: Fixed, Mobile, and Amateur Radio
description: Includes use for fixed and mobile systems, as well as amateur radio services.

label: Mobile Satellite (Uplink)
description: Used for uplink communication between earth stations and satellites.

label: Mobile Satellite (Downlink)
description: Downlink communication from satellites to earth stations.

label: Amateur Radio and Earth Exploration
description: Used for amateur radio and satellite-based earth observation.

label: Satellite Mobile Communication
description: Used for mobile satellite communication for remote areas.

label: Fixed and Mobile Satellite Communication
description: Used for fixed and mobile satellite communications.

label: Satellite and Terrestrial Communication
description: Used for both satellite and terrestrial communication services.

label: Fixed Satellite Services (FSS)
description: Used for fixed satellite communication, including data and video services.

label: Mobile Satellite Services (MSS)
description: Mobile satellite services used for communication, including voice and data services.

label: Radio Astronomy
description: Allocated for radio astronomy observations.

label: Satellite Communication (Uplink and Downlink)
description: Uplink and downlink communication for satellite systems.

label: Fixed Satellite Service (FSS)
description: Used for satellite communication in the fixed satellite service.

label: Mobile Satellite Communication (MSS)
description: Communication services used for mobile satellite communication in remote areas.

label: Not Allocated
description: Not allocated for any specific purpose.

label: Meteorological Aids
description: Used for meteorological aids such as lightning detection systems.

label: Meteorological Aids & Radionavigation
description: Band used for meteorological aids and radionavigation.

label: Fixed & Maritime Mobile
description: Used for fixed and maritime mobile communication.

label: Fixed & Maritime Mobile (Further allocations)
description: Further maritime mobile and fixed communication bands.

label: Standard Frequency and Time Signal (20 kHz)
description: Used for standard frequency and time signals.

label: Fixed & Maritime Mobile (Further allocations)
description: Further allocation for fixed and maritime mobile.
